TestCase.name: testCommonSubExpression
TestCase.Resource: (select 1 from dept where abs(-1)=20) union all (select 1 from dept where abs(-1)=20)

TestCase.name: testGC
TestCase.Resource: select upper(name) from dept where deptno=20

TestCase.name: testGroup
TestCase.Resource: select upper(name) from dept where deptno=20
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[UPPER($1)]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 20)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])
LogicalCalc(expr#0..1=[{inputs}], expr#2=[UPPER($t1)], expr#3=[20], expr#4=[=($t0, $t3)], EXPR$0=[$t2], $condition=[$t4]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])

TestCase.name: testMatchLimitOneBottomUp
TestCase.Resource: (select name from dept union select ename from emp) union (select ename from bonus)

LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[CAST($1):VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, BONUS]])

LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) LogicalUnion(all=[true]) LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[CAST($1):VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, BONUS]])

TestCase.name: testMatchLimitOneTopDown
TestCase.Resource: (select name from dept union select ename from emp) union (select ename from bonus)

LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[CAST($1):VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, BONUS]])

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) LogicalUnion(all=[true]) LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[CAST($1):VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, BONUS]])

TestCase.name: testMatchUntilFixpoint
TestCase.Resource: (select name from dept union select ename from emp) union (select ename from bonus)

LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[CAST($1):VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, BONUS]])

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) LogicalUnion(all=[true]) LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) LogicalUnion(all=[true]) LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[CAST($1):VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, BONUS]])

TestCase.name: testMaterialization
TestCase.Resource: select * from dept

TestCase.name: testPlanToDot
TestCase.Resource: select name from sales.dept

TestCase.name: testRelDigestLength
TestCase.Resource: select * from (select name from sales.dept union all select name from sales.dept union all select name from sales.dept union all select name from sales.dept union all select name from sales.dept union all select name from sales.dept union all select name from sales.dept union all select name from sales.dept union all select name from sales.dept union all select name from sales.dept union all select name from sales.dept)

TestCase.name: testRelNodeCacheWithDigest
TestCase.Resource: (select n_nationkey from SALES.CUSTOMER) union all (select n_name from CUSTOMER_MODIFIABLEVIEW)
LogicalUnion(all=[true]) LogicalProject(N_NATIONKEY=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, CUSTOMER]]) LogicalProject(N_NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, CUSTOMER]])

TestCase.name: testReplaceCommonSubexpression
TestCase.Resource: select d1.deptno from (select * from dept) d1, (select * from dept) d2

LogicalProject(DEPTNO=[$0]) LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) LogicalProject(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])
LogicalProject(DEPTNO=[$0]) LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])

TestCase.name: testRuleClass
TestCase.Resource: (select name from dept union select ename from emp) intersect (select fname from customer.contact)

LogicalIntersect(all=[false]) LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[CAST($1):VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[CAST($1):VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, CUSTOMER, CONTACT]])

TestCase.name: testRuleDescription
TestCase.Resource: select name from sales.dept where deptno=12
LogicalProject(NAME=[$1]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 12)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])
LogicalProject(NAME=[$1]) LogicalCalc(expr#0..1=[{inputs}], expr#2=[12], expr#3=[=($t0, $t2)], proj#0..1=[{exprs}], $condition=[$t3]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])

TestCase.name: testSubprogram
TestCase.Resource: select upper(ename) from (select lower(ename) as ename from emp where empno = 100)
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[UPPER(LOWER($1))]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 100)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
LogicalCalc(expr#0..8=[{inputs}], expr#9=[LOWER($t1)], expr#10=[UPPER($t9)], expr#11=[100], expr#12=[=($t0, $t11)], EXPR$0=[$t10], $condition=[$t12]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
